synopsis.text: Friends, fashion, and a flair for justice - meet Kotobuki Ran, the ultimate Shibuya Gal! Born into a family of dedicated police officers, Ran has no interest in following the family tradition. Instead, she's all about living life to the fullest with her best friends Miyu and Aya, exploring the vibrant world of Shibuya. From shopping sprees to karaoke nights, Ran's days are filled with laughter and excitement. But don't let her trendy appearance deceive you; beneath her stylish exterior lies a fierce sense of justice. When trouble arises, Ran is always ready to leap into action and defend her friends and city. Join Ran and her friends as they navigate the thrilling, unpredictable life of a Gal, creating unforgettable memories and becoming legends in their own right!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
